html:
8.9.22  11:38 am   where is the wfaoie episode 2 that you promised?

      i don't recall promising that

8.9.22  11:32 am   Do you think we will ever achieve the purpose of human life?

     yes

      What would happen after?

     more purpose

8.9.22  11:11 am   is Piano Man by Billy Joel in 3/4 or 6/8?

      i'd say 6/8, with 2 chords per bar

8.9.22  10:11 am   how do i type

      not necessary. everything has already been typed

8.9.22  8:36 am   Are you a king now?

      no but i am the next best thing

8.9.22  6:38 am   What is your opinion on soft couches?

      they are good, as long as their softness is within the bounds of the law

8.9.22  5:01 am   how to be productive

      what would you like to produce

8.9.22  12:24 am   If an Ostrich told you the world was fake, would you believe it?

      no

8.8.22  10:58 pm   How do I write music?

     i'm not sure

      Whenever I try, it always sounds bad. How do I find something good to write

     in this case, i'd say try making it even worse. things should turn around

8.8.22  10:22 pm   You are given the right to permanently and irreversibly change one fundamental law of physics.

     that's not true

      What would it be, and why?

8.8.22  8:18 pm   thoughts on peach cobbler? 

      never heard of it

8.8.22  8:06 pm   i have an idea for a novel, and i have developed it in my head alot. while it is probably a different process than songwriting, how do i gain the motivation to actually write it out

      i guess it depends how bad you want it

8.8.22  7:33 pm   how come others can improve but i may not

      why would you think that

8.8.22  7:16 pm   has a question on this page ever given you an idea for a tune?

      no

8.8.22  7:14 pm   i want to be helpful but i also don't want to get in anyone's way, what do i do?

      see if you can parse the helpfulness out into fractions. like microdosing helpfulness. then you can gauge the reaction on a fractional basis

8.8.22  6:11 pm   hi, declined a job offer but now i want it. what do i do? pls help im sad

      the next time you get a good job offer, you will be even more glad to accept it, now that you've had this experience

8.8.22  4:56 pm   opinion on pennies?

      hilarious

8.8.22  4:06 pm   What are you opinions on rough clothing?

      too soft

8.8.22  3:09 pm   i'm moving to upstate new york, what should i know going into it

      nothing. learn everything when you get there. actually i would recommend you just know which part of the state you are going, just so you know how to get there

8.8.22  2:46 pm   Do you like cars?

      i like the roads

8.8.22  2:13 pm   opinions on those tiny square scooters you sit on from gym class?

      there's no way those still exist

8.8.22  12:53 pm   thoughts on cargo shorts?

      a good place to store other types of shorts

8.8.22  12:24 pm   Is the English language properly equipped to contain within words the meaning of life?

      yes. the meaning of life can be expressed just about anywhere

8.8.22  11:19 am   opinion on toasters?

      i just like pictures of toasters

8.8.22  10:22 am   Is it actually true that you have friends who enjoy reading your book about friendship and are impressed by the amount of pages it has?

      absolutely not

8.8.22  10:11 am   i'm at a legal focus group and everyone who's showed up waiting at this table is on their phone. including me. except this one woman and she's twiddling her thumbs probably noticing the same thing. i wish i weren't but i'm just not.  a conversationalist.          don't want to keep on like this but it seems like a whole lot of other people are too. have wanted to work on the basic human connection thing for a long time.  but there's a lot of other things too.  how do you jump into the cold deep end when there's a lot of other important pools to jump into. aaa.  aaaaaaaaaaa.    aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa.  panicked screams at a respectful indoor volume. 

      have you tried jumping onto the ground plane

8.8.22  9:16 am   do you make your music from the quantum realm, and just film what you see

      that would be the best case scenario. i'm mostly just trying to simulate that

8.8.22  7:42 am   how to find self

      find everything other than self

8.8.22  6:41 am   your favourite video

      i can't think of any videos

8.8.22  5:58 am   do you spend time writing lyrics or do you just write your stream of thoughts

      it's mostly never just lyrics. the lyrics are meant to be sung in melodies, with music. so i do all the music together (including words). that being said, the best results are when it comes to me instantly. however, sometimes it takes a long time to coax myself into a comfortable enough state for this to occur properly

8.8.22  4:52 am   What questions make you uncomfortable

      i can't tell you

8.8.22  3:54 am   You mention trying to combine song and scene a lot. Any reason(s) it's such a challenge? Anything that would make it easier to achieve? Is the medium to express it just not right?

      the challenge of merging song and scene is that sometimes the songs just happen in bits. bits that would never work outside the context of the scenes. the challenge is to do it in a way that the song fits perfectly in the scene but ALSO is a playable entity on its own. a song that can survive on its own, without the scene(s). i doubt anyone's gonna want to have "but then cortez came and smashed it" on their playlist

8.8.22  2:52 am   how did you choose the font that you now use in all your videos

      i went for the most normal one i could find

8.8.22  2:15 am   Are you really a princess or a intergeometrical being of polygons

     no, but sometimes it feels that way

8.8.22  1:37 am   Is nothing just a social construct designed to be ominous

     i suppose so

      or do you think that there can actually be nothing?

     there are situations that vividly create the nothing effect

     What does nothing even mean?

     put some somethings, then draw attention to the other space where the somethings are not. so in this way, you could say 'nothing' is hard to create without having some somethings to contrast against

8.8.22  12:46 am   Do you purposefully make the question page hard to read?

     no

      Like, do you shuffle the questions?

      no

8.8.22  12:18 am   how long did it take you to learn 3d animation?

      it potentially takes a life time

8.7.22  11:07 pm   i'm gonna make music that doesn't melt when you slow it down

      fair enough

8.7.22  10:09 pm   Hi bill, any advice to someone whose brain just feels like is changing to a non-verbal language when talking with other people? 

      maybe you can get some different colored lights that have different meanings

8.7.22  9:26 pm   why arent you allowed to be cruel on stage?

      it's in the hand book

8.7.22  9:00 pm   how to get common sense because i may be lacking some

      everything is common sense

8.7.22  8:55 pm   how to be productive

      what would you like to produce

8.7.22  6:10 pm   why are you stuck in a glowing rectangle?? how can we get you out

      nevermind that, why are you stuck in purple text

8.7.22  5:05 pm   hey bill, do you think the bpm of a song matters?

     yes

     like do you think about the pace a song should go or do you just plug random numbers in?

     if i've already started writing the song, then i already know how fast it should be and i just set the tempo to match that. however, if i'm starting writing a song and i'm playing the game where you pick the tempo first and then write the song, then hell yes go ahead and randomize it. from 60 to 120 should be sufficient

      this question is probably super weird considering your specific style but im asking regardless since im thinking of getting into music

8.7.22  4:31 pm   what do you think about textured floors (non-carpet)?

      i'd think about what texture it is. since you didn't tell me, i'm now wondering what texture it is. but in the case that i do know what texture it is, i'd be thinking about whatever texture it is, whatever texture that may be

8.7.22  2:03 pm   Do you relate to whatever emotion motivated me to run into the woods listening to music today?

      sure yes

8.7.22  1:50 pm   are you still using that Yamaha MM8?

     never did

     If not, what did you end up upgrading to? I've never owned a workstation and I'm thinking about picking one up.

      that's cool. no reason to get the one i have. it's just a normal one. the only requirement is that the keys work

8.7.22  12:28 pm   You've mentioned that you mostly write music from beginning to end.  Does it ever happen that you come up with a tune or lyric, and as the song comes out, you realize you want to shuffle it around a bit, or do things generally stay in the order they appeared in?

      often i will be bombarded by ideas that would go much better the second or 9th or 101th time through that section. for example if i have a verse melody, i always get bombarded by things that would work super great in the 57th verse. of course i'll write them all down, but only time will tell whether that actually works or comes up again when the 57th verse rolls around. and it won't, because the song would surely be over by then, unless it's one of those non-ending songs

8.7.22  10:14 am   why do i have to say the magic word when i want something?

      i don't know. i don't think you do

8.7.22  8:51 am   favorite nature thing rn?

      water
